Entities.Name: Disorder
Entities.Definition: Clinical findings categorized under the 'disorder' semantic type in SNOMED-CT, automatically extracted from radiological text reports using a NER system. These represent pathologies, diagnoses, or abnormalities often linked to COVID-19.

Dataset.Name: HT Médica Radiological Report Corpus
Dataset.Description: A dataset of 295 Spanish-language chest CT radiology reports annotated for COVID-19 diagnosis consistency, collected in April 2020 from HT Médica.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: NER was performed using the BSB system with SNOMED-CT filtering to include only disorder-type concepts. Concept mapping followed Spanish SNOMED-CT COVID-19 extensions and mutual information scores were used to rank relevant features for classification.
